Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Represent the Board of the game where player can place, move or build with their workers
    BoardCell
    Represent a single Cell contained in the Board of the game
    Card
    Represents a God card with strategies to be used by the worker
    CardDeck
    Represent list of all the Cards that can be chosen by players
    ChoseCardsTurn
    Represent a specific type of game Turn on which players are allowed just to choose Cards
    FixedArray<T>
    Array with final size, which doesn't allow resizing
    Game
    Manages a game from start to end, handles the creation and advancement of turns
    GameSerializer
    Manages writing and reading game state to file, to enable persistency
    ModelEventEmitter
    allows to emit different types of ModelEvent events with a single function ModelEvent event are sent to View
    NormalTurn
    Represent actual normal turn in Game where player can do movements and buildings with their workers
    Optional<I>  
    PlaceWorkersTurn
    Represent a specific type of game Turn on which players are allowed just to place their workers on the Board
    Player
    Single player of the game
    Position
    defines size of the Board and range of possible positions accepted every BoardCell is related to a Position
    Turn
    defines the abstract generic game Turn
    UndoBlob
    class used to save and load Turn state in order to let players 'Undo' their last operation
    Worker
    Class for a single worker assigned to a player
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Level
    Represent building levels related to a single BoardCell, used for movements and buildings
    Operation
    Type of operation done by a worker on the board
    PlayerColor
    color of a player in a game
    TurnPhase
    defines particular kind of turn chooseCards : players can only choose cards placeWorkers : players can only place their workers on the Board normal : players can move their worker and build
